text: Giacomo Castellini (active 1678) was an Italian painter of the Baroque period.Saggi sull'architettura e sulla pittura, by Francesco Algarotti, page 542. He was a pupil of Francesco Gessi in Bologna. He painted a copy of Guido Reni's Massacre of the Innocents for the Basilica of San Petronio.Felsina pittrice vite de' pittori bolognesi, by Carlo Cesare Malvasia, Volume 2, page 17. ==References== Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:Italian Baroque painters
title: Giacomo Castellini
